name: ahDeck
description:
ahDeck is a desktop interface that can open many applications or files more easily and also makes the desktop look cleaner.

Super Fast - You can open the application from anywhere at any time

Lifetime Support - One-time purchase, so you can keep your app updated

Easy To Use - Simply press "ALT + Right Click" and you're good to go

IMPORTANT !
For now the purchase is only available at the official web store, due to the order list and serial number distribution.

PURCHASE
Website : https://ahdeckstore.com/#purchase
